game.name: Fight for Olympus
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This single player deckbuilding game with a light Greek mythology theme has over 250 cards to collect by defeating enemy hordes with superior tactics through positioning and well timed sorceries. Unlock almost 40 different deck types with their own particular strategy and a plethora of card combos.
